title: Spicy carrot and coriander soup
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon of olive oil', '2 large onions, chopped', '5 carrots, peeled and chopped', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '1 big red chilli, finely chopped (include seeds)', '3 (400g) tins of plum tomatoes, with juice', '250ml vegetable stock', '1 bunch chopped fresh coriander', '2 tablespoons balsamic vinegar', '1 dessertspoon caster sugar', '1 tablespoon HP sauce', '1 tablespoon Worcestershire sauce', 'Salt and pepper to taste', '250ml double cream']
